snippet.title: Die in the Dungeon - Steam Trailer
snippet.description:
WISHLIST THE GAME ON STEAM NOW! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2026820/Die_in_the_Dungeon/

Play here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2214080/Die_in_the_Dungeon_PROLOGUE/

Official trailer for Die in the Dungeon (Steam version).

Die in the Dungeon is a deck-building, turn-based roguelite where your deck is not made out of cards, but DICE!

---

Trailer made by Gary J Kings
https://garyjkings.wordpress.com/
